line_1: And You entirely change the Question.
line_2: But spoil the Engine of Digestion;

line_1: If e'er his outside right was call'd in question:
line_2: The Stomach roar'd he soon wou'd stop digestion,

line_1: The Wooden Head resolv'd the Question;
line_2: While You and Pettis help'd the Jest on.

line_1: To ward: but how? Ay, there's the Question:
line_2: Fierce the Assault, unarm'd the Bastion.

line_1: He bow'd submissive, made no question
We must snuff hard to scent the question.
line_2: Is so far lost, in this digression

line_1: Is quite on my side of the question.
line_2: Hark you, friend Will, you're last suggestion
